title: HealthTap — 24/7 Telemedicine
description:
Get high-quality, affordable telehealth when you need it. Schedule recurring appointments with a primary care doctor of your choice or get 24/7 urgent care within seconds.

THE BEST VALUE, WITH OR WITHOUT INSURANCE:

HealthTap offers multiple ways to connect with U.S.-based, board-certified doctors without an expensive and inconvenient trip to a doctor’s office. Our doctors can write prescriptions, order lab tests and analyze results, and refer you to specialists.

Use it in all 50 states, or while traveling abroad to connect with a U.S. doctor.

---
ONE APP, TWO TYPES OF MEMBERSHIP:

◆ HEALTHTAP PRIME — $15 per month

• One easy, low price for Primary Care and 24/7 on-demand Urgent Care visits — $39 or your insurance copay (50% savings each visit).

• Exclusive access to Primary Care:
- Choose and keep your own primary care doctor.
- Stay healthy with regular screenings and check ups.
- Manage any ongoing conditions or concerns over time.

• Find doctor care that fits your needs — men’s and women’s health, children’s health, travel medicine, sexual wellness, and more.

• Search millions of trusted answers from 90,000 U.S. doctors across 147 specialties or ask your own anonymous health question and get an answer within 24 hours.

• Instantly understand what may be causing your symptoms and what doctors usually recommend doing with HealthTap AI, our doctor-trained and doctor-assisted chatbot.

•  $100 off online therapy visits with our partner, Talkspace.

•  Conveniently schedule appointments with nearby walk-in clinics nationwide, including thousands of CVS MinuteClinic locations.

•  Search millions of trusted answers from 90,000 U.S. doctors across 147 specialties or ask your own anonymous health question and get an answer within 24 hours.

•  Instantly understand what may be causing your symptoms and what doctors usually recommend doing with HealthTap AI, our doctor-trained and doctor-assisted chatbot.

•  Store all your medical records securely in one convenient-to-access app without storage limitations. Benefit from personalized care from our doctors who will always tailor their advice based on your profile and history.

•  Care for all your children is included at no additional membership cost.

◆ HEALTHTAP BASIC — Free

• 24/7 Urgent Care — talk with the first available doctor within seconds over video or text chat for advice, prescriptions, test orders, and referrals. Just $80 per visit (retail price) or your insurance copay.

• Like with HealthTap Prime, you can still ask doctors anonymously or search millions of trusted answers, check your symptoms with HealthTap AI, and schedule appointments at walk-in clinics.

--
RECOGNITION:

PC Magazine - "The next time you have a medical question… try asking the doctors on HealthTap."

Inc. - “HealthTap's diversity of patient tools sets it apart from competing tech companies.”

The New York Times - “An App That Saved 10,000 Lives.”

--
100% SECURE & CONFIDENTIAL:

We take your privacy very seriously. Your visit with the doctor is confidential and HIPAA compliant.

recentChanges:
• You can now use Google Pay to pay for your HealthTap Prime subscription & doctor visits.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

As always, if you appreciate our service, please share a positive review and spread the word to friends and family about us!
